suite.name: login with FB iOS

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

test.name: Login with Facebook test case - IOS

kw.name: Launch Application
kw.doc: Launch application. Application can be launched while Appium session running. This keyword can be used to launch application during test case or between test cases.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Handle Modals
kw.arg: //XCUIElementTypeAlert[@name="“MBC PaPremyo” Would Like to Send You Notifications"]

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Quit Application
kw.doc: Quit application. Application can be quit while Appium session is kept alive. This keyword can be used to close application during test case or between test cases.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

suite.doc: A test case for user is able to sign up and login with facebook
